meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.0. The red needle points to approximately 90 degrees (3 o'clock position, relative to 12 o'clock as 0 degrees clockwise). The dial marks indicate 0.03 is around 80-85 degrees and 0.04 is around 110-115 degrees. The needle is visually closer to the 0.03 mark, so 0.03 is chosen for the hundredths place.
